title: Having a say
creator_credit: Chris O'Rourke and Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group
brief_description: The English in the Workplace Scheme is designed to help non-English speaking unionists to take their place in Australian society. This program outlines the problems and the responses to the scheme.
